text: In a case not provided for by this chapter the rules of law and equity, including the law merchant and those rules of law and equity relating to trusts, agency, negotiable instruments, and banking, continue to apply.
historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., § 21-1711.

1973 Ed., § 21-1711.

Uniform Law

This section is based upon § 12 of the Uniform Fiduciaries Act. See Volume 7A, Part I Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition, or ULA Database on WESTLAW.

DC CODE § 21-1711

Current through December 11, 2012

title.text: Fiduciary Relations and Persons with Mental Illness. (Refs & Annos)

heading.catch_text: Cases not provided for by chapter.
